name: tapQA
overview:
Over the past two decades, we’ve learned a lot about the most effective ways to solve our clients’ software/systems testing and quality assurance challenges.

Now we’ve updated and invested in our firm to bring innovative new solutions to market, and to increase our capacity to serve clients. We offer these solutions at price points that make them a great value, even when compared to offshore alternatives.

Another important component of our mission is to advance the careers of Test and QA professionals and help newcomers enter the field, whether they join us full-time, or work with us on a project basis. If you’re a Test and QA professional in the Twin Cities area, we’d like to get to know you. If you don’t have experience in the field, but would like to explore the possibilities, please let us know. We have entry level positions, complete with formal training and mentoring.
